0x786D8BC3.name: CREATE_RUNTIME_TEXTURE_FROM_IMAGE

params.name: txd
params.description: A handle to the runtime TXD to create the runtime texture in.

params.name: txn
params.description: The name for the texture in the runtime texture dictionary.

params.name: fileName
params.description: The file name of an image to load or a base64 data URL. This should preferably be a PNG, and has to be specified as a `file` in the resource manifest.

0x786D8BC3.description: Creates a runtime texture from the specified file in the current resource or a base64 data URL.
